title: Archived YTGOTW
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user 

An Archived YouTube Game is available Thursday, May 5- Washington Nationals at Colorado Rockies, and can be used for this test.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses a game that was YTGOTW and is now archived on the Games Tab of the Watch View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN there is no YouTube messaging
AND the game plays as an archived game in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses a game that was YTGOTW and is now archived on the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN there is no YouTube messaging
AND there is no MLB.TV or YouTube option to watch the game

title: YTGOTW launch from Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses the views the YTGOTW
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "Live on YouTube- Watch Free" message is displayed
AND a YouTube option is presented in the bottom of the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the YouTube option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game is launched in YouTube

title: YTGOTW launch from Scores Tab in the MLB.TV player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View Games Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the live YTGOTW from the Scores Tab in the MLB.TV player
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Live on YouTube - Watch Free badge is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the YTGOTW
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a modal pops up displaying “Watching this game will take you to YouTube. Do you still want to watch?” With a Cancel option and & Go option
AND the game continues to play in the background

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the Cancel option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the use is returned to the Scores Tab of the player
AND the game continues to play in the background

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the Go option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game is played on YouTube

title: YTGOTW launch from Watch View Games Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View Games Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the live YTGOTW
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "Live on YouTube - Watch Free" badge is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the live YTGOTW
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game plays in YouTube

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the team page of a team that has a live YTGOTW
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the "Live on YouTube - Watch Free" messaging is displayed in the game tile 
AND a YouTube option is available in the bottom of the tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the YouTube option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game is launched in YouTube

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the YTFOGTW is live
AND the game is a no hitter
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Scores page game tile shows YouTube messaging and NO hitter badge

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the YTFOGTW is live
AND the game is a no hitter
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile on the Team page of teams in the game shows YouTube messaging and NO hitter badge (NOTE: no hitter badge not implemented on the Team page, so it is currently not expected to display. Delete this note after implementation.)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the YTFOGTW is live
AND the game is a no hitter
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Watch View games tab game tile shows YouTube messaging and NO hitter badge

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the YTFOGTW is live
AND the game is a no hitter
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MLB.TV Scores tab game tile shows YouTube messaging and NO hitter badge
